title: Baby Don’t Stop
lyrics:
Neorul cheoeum bum ihu modul sasohan iyuneul piryeo eobsojin Feeling
Choeui baekbuneuikkaji neukkyeojineun Magic seom sehan One minute
Nae modul shingyeongi jeonbu gonduseo neoreul algireul wonhae
Nasseolgo mimyohan jageun tteollimajeo jeonbu da jeonhaejine
Stop baby don’t stop

Meomchuji ma Baby don’t stop

Naman arabol teukbyeolhan geu Sign (Cool)

Dul ppunin jigeum baby don’t stop

Stop baby don’t stop (don’t stop)

Dulman aneul eunmilhan Sign (baby don’t stop no)

Hanahana da wanbyeolhan gu Sign

Areumdawo So baby don’t stop (baby don’t stop)



Play play play play play I’ll play in the Paris

Stay clay sketch dirt dough I’m gonna knead your body

Roseuko ogwiseuteu rodaeng keurodel ttatteuthan saeggame

Neoreul bicheul geoya All day Holding kkwak jabajwo nal (all day)



Baby Don’t Stop

Come on, come on, come on, come on, come on

Baby Don’t Stop



Yeobudo eobshi shideuldeon kkotdo dwisallineul bulssiga neora

Gamgage momeul matgyeo beonjeoganeun nunbitche euijihae Come to me

Jobeun uri dul saie nopajeoman ganeun ginjanggam

I feel so right adeukhan mankeum deouk dalkomhan



Stop baby don’t stop (don’t stop)

Meomchuji ma Baby don’t stop (no)

Naman arabol teukbyeolhan geu Sign (don’t stop)

Dul ppunin jigeum Baby don’t stop



Gonna gonna gonna gonna get that (Stop Baby don’t stop)

Neoreul nochil ireun eobji gonna get that (Stop baby don’t stop)

Gonna gonna gonna gonna get that (Stop Baby don’t stop)

Jeoldae meomchul ireun eobji gonna get that (Stop baby don’t stop)



Cotton, wind, blow, blouse (Stop baby don’t stop)

Hair, flower, aroma, scent (Stop baby don’t stop)

Cold, eyes, ice, dive (Stop baby don’t stop)

Touch, warm, melt, lips (Stop baby don’t stop)

Baby, baby I just feel so right

Baby, I just feel so nice

Gamjang wanbyeokhan geu Sign

Oh baby, give it to me



Stop baby don’t stop (don’t stop)

Meomchuji ma Baby don’t stop (baby don’t stop no)

Naman arabol teukbyeolhan geu Sign

Dul ppunin jigeum Baby don’t stop (baby don’t stop)



Ppareuge naraga neoege daheul geoya Mi amor (baby don’t stop and no)

Geonneopyeon haneure isseodo gyesokhae chajeul geoya neol (baby don’t stop today)

Just get yourself around it’ now yeah (baby don’t stop and no)

Estoy loco mi dulce coco (baby don’t stop today)



Gonna gonna gonna gonna get that

Neoreul nochil ireun eobji gonna get that

Gonna gonna gonna gonna get that

Jeoldae meomchul ireun eobji gonna get that



Pi pa pi pa pa (Stop baby don’t stop)

Pi pa pa ru la pi pa pa (Stop baby don’t stop)

Pi pa pi pa pa (Stop baby don’t stop)

Pi pa pa ru la pi pa pa (Stop baby don’t stop)



Stop baby don’t stop
